description: Information Technology Infrastructure in Support of Command and Control ITI in Sp of C2 Invitation to Qualify ITQ
full_summary:
## Information Technology Infrastructure in Support of Command and Control (ITI in Sp of C2)

### Solicitation Overview

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) and the Canadian Armed Forces (CAF), invites qualified suppliers to respond to an Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) for a contract to provide a secure, hyperscale cloud capability as part of the Information Technology Infrastructure in Support of Command and Control (ITI in Sp of C2) Project.

### Purpose and Objectives

The purpose of this ITQ is to:

* Finalize the Statement of Requirements (SOR) and system specifications for cloud services
* Notify potential suppliers of security requirements for follow-on procurement phases and resulting contracts
* Provide other relevant information on the potential Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Outline contractual clauses for subsequent Funded Engagement contracts

### Requirement Description

The DND and CAF require a secure, integrated Secret-level IT infrastructure to converge and reduce the number of DND/CAF Secret networks, provide enhanced connectivity and information sharing capabilities, and readily evolve to meet future challenges. This infrastructure will enable commanders across the CAF to exercise Command and Control (C2), using the latest available technologies to provide optimal support capabilities.

### ITQ Process

* All interested suppliers may submit a bid
* Only qualified suppliers meeting the ITQ requirements will be provided the opportunity to bid on the final RFP
* One or multiple Funded Engagement Contracts may be awarded to qualified suppliers in the follow-on phase

### Security Requirements

* The ITQ does not have security requirements, but the post-ITQ Funded Engagement Contract will require appropriate security clearances
* Suppliers may be required to hold a security clearance of SECRET or TOP SECRET

### Attachment and Documents

A link to the solicitation documents is provided below:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/... (PDF documents)

### Request for Enquiries

All enquiries must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority no later than ten calendar days before the ITQ closing date.

### Procurement Details

* Solicitation Number: W8474-18IT01/C
* Tender Closing Date: Thursday, March 28, 2024
* Contracting Authority: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
* Contact Information: Aaron Abela, TPSGC.PADivisionQE-APQEDivision.PWGSC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Important Notes
